pRu#thiqvyA paqrO dEqvEBiqrasu#raiqrguhAq yat | 
ka(gg) sviqdgarBa#M prathaqmaM da#ddhraq ApOq yatra# dEqvAH saqmaga#cCantaq viSvE$ || 
tamidgarBaM# prathaqmaM da#ddhraq ApOq yatra# dEqvAH saqmaga#cCantaq viSvE$ | 
aqjasyaq nABAqvaddhyEkaq-marpi#taqM ~Myasmi#nniqdaM ~MviSvaqM Buva#naqmadhi# SriqtaM || 
viqSvaka#rmAq hyaja#niShTa dEqva Adid-ga#ndhaqrvO a#Bavad dviqtIya#H | 
tRuqtIya#H piqtA ja#niqtauSha#dhInA - [  ] 8
